creator: chung@amazon.com
text:
If a server tries to set the same cookie twice, CookieManager stores both of 
them.  There should be some logic that does replacement of cookies with the 
same name and domain.  (I believe that's how a browser works).

This is fixed in the current code. Please re-open with further details if the
problem is still present.
creator: sebb@apache.org
